patthana23.10:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.10:2.1: Nakusalaṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.10:3.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
